description: A Flutter application source file defining the main app entry point, a stateless widget for app configuration, and a stateful widget for the home page UI with a loading indicator.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget configuring the application theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the main screen with title.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class managing the UI of the home page including a loading indicator.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point initializing and running the app.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for MyApp and _MyHomePageState, constructing widget trees.
